content:
Hi everyone,

I want to state a list of theorems with
variable (F E : Type*)
with one last theorem adding an additional variable
variable (L : Type*)

This would make the order of the inputs of the last theorem become F, E, L. What I want is F, L, E, what should I do? Thank you!
You can write all the variable in this statement, it will override the section variables
You should also be able to use variable (F L E : Type*) from the start and hope that Lean includes L only when it is really needed.
(and especially with the new variable behaviour, this should be successful!)

Damiano Testa said:

(and especially with the new variable behaviour, this should be successful!)

Thank you! It works.
Jiang Jiedong has marked this topic as resolved.
